spaceinvaders.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceinvaders.server.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>, Service<java.lang.Void>

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service<java.lang.Void>
    Server-side of the game.

    Inside here happens all the game logic. It cannot be played without a running server.

    A player uses the client to communicate with the server. Once the connection is established, the server starts the game. The server sends game events to the client (for exemple the invaders have moved). Meanwhile the client sends the actions of the user. Once the game is over, the client is disconnected.

      Construct a server that will listen for connections on port port.
